Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 43rd/LaSalle
ShortDescription: Eastbound #43 buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, LaSalle, Root, State, and 43rd due to a disabled truck near 43rd/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, LaSalle, Root, State, and 43rd due to a disabled truck near 43rd/LaSalle.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lunt/Ashland
ShortDescription: Westbound #96 buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland, and Lunt, due to construction near Lunt/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland, and Lunt, due to construction near Lunt/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier equipment problem at Armitage. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier equipment problem at Armitage.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
